articles.title: Shweta Tiwari keeps custody of 5-year-old son, father Abhinav Kohli gets visitation rights - India Today
articles.description: Shweta Tiwari keeps the custody of her son, Reyansh. However, Abhinav Kohli can visit him on weekends for two hours and talk daily over via video calls.
